remarks: The value of the "edge function" of a graph is a set containing two elements (the endvertices of the corresponding edge).  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 18-Dec-2017.)
statement:
usgraedg3 $p |- ( ( V USGrph E /\ X e. dom E ) -> E. x e. V E. y e. V ( x =/= y /\ ( E ` X ) = { x , y } ) ) $.
$d E x y $.
$d V x y $.
$d X x y $.
